name: Wheels and Bones
overview: Basically a Tic Tac Toe game where you either try to get 3 across up, down or diagonally for the basic game or the Wheels & Bones variant where you try NOT to get 3 in a row and if you boy the other player's piece in a corner or get on both sides your peice becomes his. The game delights with interesting graphics and animations. Created by Rick Ferriera for the C128 only. Included in Loadstar 128 #17. The game works in 80-columns mode.
